--------------------
Text: Hello I Feel the Same:  It was released on October 16, 2015, via Korda Records, a cooperative record label founded by The Ocean Blue, a band with whom the Innocence Mission formed a "long and deep friendship that goes back to some of each band's first shows in Pennsylvania and their major label debut records on Sire and A&M".
Triplets:<The Ocean Blue

--------------------
Text: Hello I Feel the Same:  An edition on translucent green vinyl was released from early January 2016.
